definition: to draw (e.g. a bow)/to pull/to stretch sth/to extend/to lengthen/to involve or implicate in/to attract/to lead/to guide/to leave/to provide evidence or justification for/old unit of distance equal to 10 丈[zhang4], one-thirtieth of a km or 33.33 meters
ordinal number/day of a month/mark/sign/business establishment/size/ship suffix/horn (wind instrument)/bugle call/assumed name/to take a pulse/classifier used to indicate number of people

sentences.english: Atoms must start with a lower case character, or you can delimit with single quotes.
sentences.chinese: 原子值必須以小寫字母開頭，否則需要加上單引號。

sentences.english: Single quotation marks must delimit each alias.
sentences.chinese: 必須使用單引號確定每個別名的界限。

sentences.english: Incorporate quotations of three lines or less into the text, within single quotation marks.
sentences.chinese: 文本中三行或更少的合併的引用語，用單引號。

sentences.english: Sometimes you need to escape a single quote as we'll see.
Where x and y are floats.
Tokenize string with space seperated values unless values are wrapped in single quotes.
sentences.chinese: 標記與空間分離值，除非值字符串用單引號。

sentences.english: The use of the two single quotes is discussed in the next section.
sentences.chinese: 下一節討論爲什麼要使用兩個單引號。

sentences.english: When working with string data, you can use either double quotation marks or single quotation marks to delimit them.
sentences.chinese: 在處理字符串數據時，可以使用雙引號或單引號分隔。

sentences.english: When working with string data, you can use either double quotation marks or single quotation marks to delimit them.
sentences.chinese: 在處理字符串數據時，可以使用雙引號或單引號分隔。

sentences.english: Surely it's the word 'defence' that should be in quotes.
sentences.chinese: 毫無疑問，防禦這個詞應該括上雙引號。

sentences.english: If you need quotation marks inside the alias, use double quotation marks.
sentences.chinese: 如果您需要在別名中使用引號，那麼可以使用雙引號。

sentences.english: If you need quotation marks inside the alias, use double quotation marks.
sentences.chinese: 如果您需要在別名中使用引號，那麼可以使用雙引號。

sentences.english: Attribute values must always be enclosed in quotes, but either single or double quotes can be used.
sentences.chinese: 屬性值必須附在引號裏表示，單引和雙引都可以用。

sentences.english: Single quotation marks interpolate and see the backslashes as escape characters.
sentences.chinese: 單引號插入並將反斜槓看作是轉義符。

sentences.english: I see. Because I've got a quote in a quote.
sentences.chinese: 一個引號所以有個語法錯誤。

definition: Chinese back-sloping comma 、 (punct. used to separate items in a list)
lit. view a text and interpret (idiom); to interpret word by word without understanding the meaning/a far-fetched interpretation
delaying tactics/stalling/measures to stave off an attack/stratagem to win a respite
